thread.title: Frank Ocean Talks Blonde in Unearthed Interview: Watch
thread.title_full: Frank Ocean Talks Blonde in Unearthed Interview: Watch

author: Sam Sodomsky
title: Frank Ocean Talks Blonde in Unearthed Interview: Watch
text:
Frank Ocean Talks Blonde in Unearthed Interview: Watch Along with a promotional clip for the album and his Boys Don’t Cry magazine Frank Ocean Photo by D Dipasupil/FilmMagic 
Previously unreleased interview footage of Frank Ocean has surfaced online via the fan account TeamFrankDaily . In the video, Ocean discusses his inspiration for last year’s Blonde and Endless . “There’s no fantasy on this record, or any of the music,” he says, “It’s all, for better or worse, autobiographical—just my experience, the foundation of what’s made me who I am today.” A promotional clip for Blonde and his Boys Don’t Cry magazine has also surfaced. Watch both videos below.
